sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Related articles

- ThinkPad docks
- Thunderbolt
- DisplayLink
- External GPU

This is the Docking main page which contains links to articles related to this subject as well as a list of tested dockings from multiple vendors and different connections such as Thunderbolt, Thinkpad connector, USB-C with DisplayLink, USB-C with DisplayPort Alternate Mode, monitors that have built-in docking on its rear or External GPU dockings that offer extra ports.

sections.title: Dell Dockings
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | fwupd | usb/pci id | Connectivity | Sound | Ethernet | Card Reader | Video Ports | USB Ports | Other Ports | PCI Slots | Max Video Resolution | Remarks
Dell D6000 With USB 3.0 (3.1 Gen 1) | 2018-05-15 | No | 17e9:6006 | USB-C + DisplayLink | Yes | Yes | N/A | 1xHDMI, 2xDP | 2xUSB3 and 1xUSB-C (front), 2xUSB3 (rear) | N/A | N/A | 2560x1440@144Hz on DP | Although manuals state max 60Hz on DP and HDMI, docking achieved 144Hz on dual 2560x1440 monitors. Follow the DisplayLink modules install. No power button on this docking.

sections.title: ThinkPad/Lenovo Dockings
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | fwupd | usb/pci id | Connectivity | Sound | Ethernet | Card Reader | Video Ports | USB Ports | Other Ports | PCI Slots | Max Video Resolution | Remarks
ThinkPad Thunderbolt 3 Dock Gen 2 | 2020-06-01 | Yes |  | Thunderbolt | Yes | Yes | N/A | 2xHDMI or DP(combo ports) | 1xUSB3 and 1xUSB-C (front), 4xUSB3 with 2 (rear) | Docking to Laptop(Thinkpad only) power connector | N/A | 2560x1440@60Hz on HDMI | All ports recognized out of the box. Audio volume on p2 is low on this docking.
ThinkVision P27h-20 Monitor with Docking | 2020-02-16 | No | 0bda:0412 | USB-C | Yes (untested p2 aux) | Yes | No | 1xHDMI and 2xDP(One input, one for Daisy Chain/Out) | 2xUSB3 with charging(side), 2xUSB3.1(rear) | USB3.1 Type-C for laptop/pc Upstream | N/A | 2560x1440@60Hz on USB-C/HDMI/DP | All ports recognized out of the box. Speakers didn't map on USB-C to a sink on Pipewire. Delivered 65w of charge to my laptop

sections.title: Startech Dockings
sections.content:
Table content:
Model version | Date | fwupd | usb/pci id | Connectivity | Sound | Ethernet | Card Reader | Video Ports | USB Ports | Other Ports | PCI Slots | Max Video Resolution | Remarks
Startech Thunderbolt 4 Dock | 2021-12-06 | No |  | Thunderbolt | Yes | Yes | Yes | 2xThunderbolt 4+USB4 ports | 1xUSB2.0(front), Thunderbolt Host Port(front), 3xUSB3.2(rear), 3xThunderbolt 4/USB4 ports(rear) | SD 4.0/UHS-II(front), P2 headset(front) | N/A | 4K@604Hz 2 monitors, 8K@60Hz 1 monitor | All ports recognized out of the box. While there are 3 Thunderbolt4+USB4 ports at the rear, only 2 can be used simultaneously for monitors. Kesington lock. Thunderbolt host port is at the front. No power button available.
